title: BREAKING: Matthew Stafford traded to Rams, Jared Goff to Lions | CBS Sports HQ
author: CBS Sports HQ
description:
CBS Sports NFL Writer Ryan Wilson breaks down both sides of the Rams-Lions trade that sent two 1st round picks, a 3rd round pick, and Jared Goff to the Lions in exchange for Matthew Stafford.

localize.description:
CBS体育NFL撰稿人Ryan Wilson分析了公羊队和狮子队交易的双方，公羊队送出了两个首轮选秀权，一个第三轮选秀权和Jared Goff，换来了Matthew Stafford。
